other_tests.findings: Glomerulitis with mononuclear cells, scattered neutrophils, and swollen endothelial cells; increased peritubular capillaries with mononuclear cells, plasma cells, and occasional neutrophils.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings were consistent with acute cellular and humoral rejection.

other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm at a rate of 64 beats per minute.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased to sinus rhythm at 44 beats per minute upon presentation; new nonspecific T-wave abnormalities appeared.

other_tests.findings: Resistive indexes of the arcuate arteries ranged from 0.74 to 0.83.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased to 0.84 to 1.00 upon admission, suggesting transplant rejection.

other_tests.findings: Left ventricular ejection fraction of 64% and estimated right ventricular systolic pressure of 68 mm Hg.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Unchanged from a previous study; regional wall-motion abnormalities improved.

other_tests.findings: Cortisol level was low at 3.7 Î¼g per deciliter.
